title: Leire Landa
text:
Leire Landa Iroz (born 19 December 1986) is a Spanish former <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who most recently played as a <a href="Defender%20%28Association%20football%29">defender</a> for <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20%28women%29">Primera División</a> club <a href="FC%20Barcelona%20%28women%29">FC Barcelona</a> and the <a href="Spain%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Spain women's national football team</a>. She also played for <a href="Real%20Sociedad%20%28women%29">Real Sociedad</a>, <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Madrid%20%28women%29">Atlético Madrid</a> and <a href="Athletic%20Club%20%28women%29">Athletic Bilbao</a>.
International career.
In June 2013 national team <a href="Coach%20%28sports%29">coach</a> <a href="Ignacio%20Quereda">Ignacio Quereda</a> selected Landa in the Spain squad for <a href="UEFA%20Women%27s%20Euro%202013">UEFA Women's Euro 2013</a> in Sweden. She was also part of Spain's team at the <a href="2015%20FIFA%20Women%27s%20World%20Cup">2015 FIFA Women's World Cup</a> in Canada.
Personal.
She wore the 23 shirt at Atlético in homage to former footballer <a href="Iv%C3%A1n%20de%20la%20Pe%C3%B1a">Iván de la Peña</a>, well known for his shaved head, who was an inspirational model when she suffered from <a href="Burkitt%27s%20lymphoma">Burkitt's lymphoma</a> as a child.
